TopicTitle: KSP crashes during VAB or SPH construction

Articles.Content:
I first came across this crash when making my big creations 2 months ago, its been preventing me go all Kerbal on my designs ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif), but I wanted to find if I could reproduce it with a simple craft. Now I have. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm interested to see if anyone else can break KSP this way too.

**Reproducing bug:**

- Load up KSP and go straight to the VAB. (I'm in Sandbox mode) I use purge\* to free up my RAM cache on mac . So I have ~600 MB left over. ![7EbGiUO.png](http://i.imgur.com/7EbGiUO.png)

- Place the Mk1 Lander Can (other parts probably work too). 

- Offset the can high up so its near the top of the VAB

- Note that Alt select on the Lander Can doesn't work (I think that's normal...)

- Place a Structural Fuselage on the bottom (Alt-no-side-attachment-placement sometimes 

helps here)

> 
> ![81CXpul.png](http://i.imgur.com/81CXpul.png)
> 
> 

- Alt select that Structural Fuselage as though you were going to duplicate it

- Enjoy the The Spinning Beach Ball of Death^TM^. Amount of RAM usage seems not to increase, CPU starts working hard.

**Machine setup:** 

No Steam involved. 

build id = 00705

2014-12-15\_13-59-25

Branch: master

Player.log: [http://www./download/p6swgahod5n6r77/Player.log](http://www./download/p6swgahod5n6r77/Player.log)

KSP.log: [http://www./download/iu8mhw04udyxio4/KSP.log](http://www./download/iu8mhw04udyxio4/KSP.log)

System crash log: [http://www./download/ur4m70x5xjn2ws5/KSP_2015-03-30-195252_Iains-MacBook-Pro-2.hang](http://www./download/ur4m70x5xjn2ws5/KSP_2015-03-30-195252_Iains-MacBook-Pro-2.hang)

Happy bug hunting!

\*
